summary.span: Represents a collection of objects in the control.

span.span: Represents a collection of objects in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 ，您存取透過屬性。On the , you access the through the property. 會使用標準和管理集合的方法。The uses standard and methods to manipulate the collection. 使用方法，以判斷特定的屬性值是否存在集合中。Use the method to determine if a specific property value exists in the collection. 此外，使用方法，以判斷任何索引集合內的物件。Additionally, use the method to determine the index of any object within the collection. > [!CAUTION] > 一律會建立物件，並將其新增至之前新增物件至。Always create objects and add them to the before adding objects to the . 當您將加入空的有效值加入集合中，自動為您產生的物件。When you add an empty with a valid value to the collection, objects are automatically generated for you. 因此，將會擲回例外狀況如果您嘗試加入新物件具有重複值來。Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new objects with duplicate values to the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列印每個資訊在。The following code example prints information about each in a .
